channel.title: Surface Tension Help
channel.description: I'm in the hall before entering the room with the missles and all the blue beam mines and explosives. How do I get past the two blue beam mines in the hall leading to that room? I try the Surface Tension help page but my computer locks up only on that forum.

item.title: Surface Tension Help
item.dc:creator: AWildHeadcrabAppears
item.description:
You probably attempted to jump over them by only pressing jump. You really need to crouch jump over them, as you do for mostly all other jumps in BMS.

Read full topic

item.title: Surface Tension Help
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Use your keyboard? Jump and crouch lol, that’s it.

Read full topic
